fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: Datalign is seeking to engage EU institutions to assess the proposal for viability and to advance the matter to Commissioner level for their consideration of the State Interface as a unique and strategic solution to the structural issues afflicting the European Union.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Datalign Ltd is proposing an administrative platform for the state which impedes shadow economic activity, raises substantial additional tax revenues and delivers a fully integrated framework for efficient state wide electronic governance and reform. The system known as the State Interface is designed as a stand-alone system which can be deployed in any jurisdiction with the same positive reform impacts and efficiency gains in every jurisdiction.
